posts.post_content: I have a N162 Dan Brouthers, N28 John Ward, and N28 John Clarkson for sale on Ebay ending Sunday Sept 30.  The John Clarkson is low grade and gorgeous!  I hate to sell these.  My Ebay ID is Zook1981
we got the ward today...super fast and well shipped great guy to buy from!!!

[quote name="benderbroeth" post=1041745]we got the ward today...super fast and well shipped great guy to buy from!!![/QUOTE]

I am really glad you are happy with it.  I was forced to sell it, but happy to see it's in good hands.
